name: Apimondia - International Federation of Beekeepers' Associations
goal:
Apimondia exists to promote scientific, technical, ecological, social and economic apicultural development in all countries and the cooperation of beekeepersâ€™ associations, scientific bodies and individuals involved in apiculture worldwide.

It also aims to put into practice every initiative that can contribute to improving apicultural practice and to rendering the obtained products profitable.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives: Apimondia is a partner in the three-year EU project "BPRACTICES" aimed at promoting good beekeeping practices particularly on the health dimension, assess their economic impact, devise a technology application for traceability of bee products and disseminating the relevant outcomes. Date of project inception February 2017
